subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Football
Lockouts
Suits and Litigation
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. says a recent legal response by the players does not dispel “serious doubts” expressed by an appeals court about a federal judge’s order that the lockout end immediately.
snippet: The N.F.L. says a recent legal response by the players does not dispel “serious doubts” expressed by an appeals court about a federal judge’s order that the lockout end immediately.
